tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP I)) (VP (VBP hate) (S (VP (VP (VBG getting) (PP (VBN followed) (PP (IN on) (NP (NN twitter))))) (, ,) (VP (VBG following) (SBAR (IN that) (FRAG (NP (NN person))))) (, ,) (ADVP (RB then)) (VP (VBG getting) (ADJP (JJ unfollowed))))))))
